name: American Monster
overview: On any street, behind any smile, lurks an American Monster. Never-before-seen-video footage looks straight into the eyes of a killer, hidden in plain sight. Mom next door; dad across the street; the kid who never broke the rules. Anyone can be a monster.

episodes.name: Home Video Hit
episodes.overview: A typical American family isn't exactly what it seems. In public, Max and Janeene Jones appear to have the perfect marriage, but behind this happy image lies hidden truths. 20 years later, an undercover police investigation reveals an unexpected killer.

episodes.name: Appalachian Horror Film
episodes.overview: Brian and Randi Trimble are in the throes of newly married life. But when Brian meets the fun-loving Blaine Norris at work, their friendship over Blaine's low-budget horror film takes a dark turn. It isn't long before three becomes a crowd...

episodes.name: Wave to Daddy
episodes.overview: The daughter of one of America's most notorious killers gives an exclusive interview, taking us on a journey into the eyes of a cold-blooded monster. Never-before-seen footage reveals the devastating double life of a murderer and his horrific crimes.

episodes.name: Sing for the Camera
episodes.overview: In the summer of 2014, a peaceful community in Hartford, WI is shaken to its core when a local teenager is found dead...the victim of a brutal murder, and the second victim in two days. The community must now come to terms that a killer lives among them.

episodes.name: Shooting Phoenix
episodes.overview: A monster stalks the summer streets of Phoenix in 2005. With never-before-seen footage, we get a glimpse into the killer's life and how he's able to hide in plain sight. Can police catch him before he strikes again?

episodes.name: Right Before Your Eyes
episodes.overview: When a good-looking, successful businessman meets an aspiring actress, she appears to be the perfect match. But the honeymoon doesn't last long. The relationship takes a turn...a deadly turn.

episodes.name: The Green Monster
episodes.overview: In rural Ohio, an intruder brutally guns down Jack and Linda Myers in their sleep. The only witness is their sleepy 4-year-old grandson. But their extensive home movies—aired here for the first time—may have captured a monster lurking in their midst.

episodes.name: Family Snapshot
episodes.overview: The Yates family moves to Spokane, WA only to find it besieged by a serial killer who's targeting young women and confounding the police. Now, the family's never-before-aired home videos provide a chilling look of one of America's most notorious killers.

episodes.name: Alabama Murder Mystery
episodes.overview: When Frank Hilley is struck down by a mysterious sickness, the entire town of Anniston, AL grieves. But when his daughter also falls seriously ill, the family becomes suspicious. Vintage home movies trace a shocking tale of murder—revealing a monster.

episodes.name: Anything For You
episodes.overview: The Snyders are thrilled when their 34-year-old son Mike finally starts a family with his sweetheart—as seen in these home videos. But after being diagnosed with a terrible illness, Mike vanishes. Only years later does his horrific fate comes to light.

episodes.name: The Last Broadcast
episodes.overview: After a taping of their local-access TV show in rural Vermont, Chrissy and Charlie Billis have a terrible accident, smashing their car into a tree. Only one survives. But tapes from the couple's TV show suggest a sinister tale behind what really happened.

episodes.name: Push Record
episodes.overview: In Colorado, second-time spouses Harold and Toni Henthorn seem to dote on their young daughter and each other, until their idyllic life is shattered by a deadly hiking accident. Their happy home videos conceal a deadly predator who nearly escaped justice.

episodes.name: Stand By Your Men
episodes.overview: After moving to a remote town in Colorado, Ron and Cynthia Phillips and their four children try to adjust. But their never-aired home videos mask darker impulses within their family - ones that would lead to a complex web of deceit, infidelity and murder.

episodes.name: Live By the Sword
episodes.overview: Outside Los Angeles, sword collector Neal Williams is the house-husband while his wife Manling keeps the family afloat. It's a tough but happy life, as their home videos attest. Until Manling returns home to find her family slaughtered— at sword point.

episodes.name: The Craigslist Killer
episodes.overview: Family and faith have always been important to Richard Beasley, as these home videos show. Which is why it's so scary when one day—the Ohio man vanishes. Especially after police discover that an online monster has been luring local men to their deaths.

episodes.name: The Wrong Man
episodes.overview: In Pennsylvania, Kevin and Joanne Dowling like to capture their kids' milestones on videotape in their modest suburban home. But when a woman in a nearby town is gunned down - and Kevin is accused of murder - his fate hangs on that same home video camera.

episodes.name: The Puppet Master
episodes.overview: In suburban California, an intruder attacks and kills 55-year-old Joan Dawley; as the Dawley family grieves, it falls to LAPD Detective Paul Tippin to crack the case; home movies reveal a shocking tale of deceit.

episodes.name: Remote Control
episodes.overview: When Sherri Dally mysteriously vanishes from her Ventura home, her husband Michael and bestfriend Debbie head up a massive search. But someone knows more than they're saying. Never-before-aired home videos trace a tale of sordid secrets and double lives.

episodes.name: Backyard Daddy
episodes.overview: In Ogden, Utah, Stephen and Becky Vargas appear to have it all; however, jealousy and control issues abound behind the picture-perfect life seen in their home videos, but no one suspects their marriage will end in murder.

episodes.name: A Mother's Work
episodes.overview: Home movies reveal the fabulous lifestyle of Lanny and Donna Horwitz who are raising their son, Radley, in their Florida mansion; when their lives are upended by a ghastly shooting, everyone in this eccentric family becomes a suspect.

episodes.name: Band of Brothers
episodes.overview: The Laffertys are pillars of the Mormon community, and they are known as an example of wholesome family values, as seen in home videos; however, an evil is lurking that will one day explode into an unholy double homicide

episodes.name: Watch Your Back
episodes.overview: Home videos show U.S. Air Force Sgt. Nathan Paet and his family living a blissfully normal life, then blind greed brings about the destruction of this loving family.

episodes.name: The Last Valentine
episodes.overview: Dr. John Hamilton and his wife, Susan, are successful, respected and very much in love, until a vicious Valentine's Day murder destroys their lives; never-before-seen home videos shed light on a brutal murder no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Into the Swamp
episodes.overview: At a family-run construction company, brothers and cousins work hard together—and play even harder. But when one of them vanishes, no one has answers. The mystery of his disappearance, and the salacious betrayal behind it, isn't solved for 20 years.

episodes.name: Don't Forget Me
episodes.overview: On the day before he's to start a new job, a father of two disappears with no warning. His wife has no idea where he went. His friends hint that he led a secret, sordid life. But it remains a mystery for years—until a tip reveals the jaw-dropping truth.

episodes.name: Off-Camera
episodes.overview: An obsessive video blogger shares every detail of her roller-coaster life with her husband and their children online; one night, intruders tie her up, kidnap her husband and execute him; it seems someone has been keeping secrets.

episodes.name: Take Me to the River
episodes.overview: Coming home from church, a preacher finds his wife stabbed and beaten, the apparent victim of a home invasion; the preacher's alibi is rock solid, and his son's alibis are sound as well; however, several details don't add up, leading to the truth.

episodes.name: Just Out of Frame
episodes.overview: A fun-loving couple cultivates close relationships with their grown daughters, then the mother is bludgeoned to death in her home; no one suspects that the unthinkable could be true, but video doesn't lie, unlike guilty people

episodes.name: Falling Down
episodes.overview: A couple's idyllic life is forever changed by an unspeakable crime.

episodes.name: Two Families
episodes.overview: Unraveling the mystery behind the confusing evidence at the scene of April Holton's tragic murder.

episodes.name: Twice Shy
episodes.overview: Carol-Ann and James Sharp seem like a match made in heaven, but behind the veneer hides a monster in plain sight; loved ones close to the couple sit down for the first time on camera to make sense of a murder that none of them saw coming.

episodes.name: Life Of The Party
episodes.overview: Doug and Rose fall in love and get married; however, lies and deceit surface behind their seemingly perfect facade as seen on home videos; then, a no-show at Thanksgiving and a box on the side of the road lead to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Looks Can Kill
episodes.overview: After locking eyes at the gym, Rebecca Thudin and Larry Fenton get married; then, Larry is shot dead in an apparent home invasion; home videos and interviews with family members help to unravel what really happened.

episodes.name: In Sickness And In Health
episodes.overview: When outgoing Beth Spaulding and shy Jason Risenburg meet, it looks like a match made in heaven; however, a series of disasters strike the once-devoted couple, causing tensions to simmer in their marriage.

episodes.name: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes
episodes.overview: When a devastating fire at the Kohnle family home leaves a family member dead, it appears to be an accident. But as the evidence mounts up it's the testimony of two young kids who lead the police to decipher if it was an accident, suicide or murder.

episodes.name: An Open Relationship
episodes.overview: Cassie Golonin disappears just before New Year's Eve from Fort Smith, Ark.; when family and friends conduct a search, the discovery of a shallow grave soon leads to the truth.

episodes.name: Edge Of Reason
episodes.overview: Todd and Rachel Winkler's life looks exquisite from the outside, but inside things are falling apart; video footage shows the truth behind their seemingly happy marriage, revealing terrible secrets and mind games that culminate in murder.

episodes.name: Double Cross
episodes.overview: Four best friends, two married couples, multiple sordid secrets, and one betrayal that leads to murder; with exclusive interviews and never-before-aired home movie footage.

episodes.name: Momma's Girl
episodes.overview: Great-grandfather Arthur Burney knows he's lucky to have such a large, loving family; but when Arthur is found murdered, the entire Burney family is divided - until a tip-off exposes a masterful plot.

episodes.name: Too Good To Be True
episodes.overview: When Amanda Schmitt marries John Grazioli, the happy day is captured on home video; six months later, police respond to a 911 call and make a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Brothers in Arms
episodes.overview: The close bond between cousins Mark Corona and Paul Stoeppler is quickly severed when one of them is murdered in cold blood; never-before-seen home movie video and shocking CCTV reveals what happened.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.overview: On any street, behind any smile, lurks an American Monster. Never-before-seen-video footage looks straight into the eyes of a killer, hidden in plain sight. Mom next door; dad across the street; the kid who never broke the rules. Anyone can be a MONSTER.

episodes.name: Once a Princess
episodes.overview: Hyrah Frasch is no ordinary baby. The photogenic one-year-old already has her own website and looks set to become an internet sensation. But when a tragic accident occurs in the family swimming pool, police discover a killer hiding in her midst.

episodes.name: Body Type
episodes.overview: Jason and Lindsey Lee are destined for each other. However, marriage can have its highs and lows. When the young couple decide to change their lifestyle to reignite the spark in the relationship, it comes with deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Staten Island Love Story
episodes.overview: When popular teacher Simeonette Mapes-Crupi is found dead in her Staten Island condo, all evidence points to a brutal robbery gone wrong; as detectives dig deeper, they uncover a wealth of secrets.

episodes.name: My Body
episodes.overview: Sandy Miles and her daughter Tracie are as close as can be. But when Tracie vanishes and Sandy is found brutally murdered, the truth behind the killing is more horrific than investigators can possibly imagine.

episodes.name: Have You Seen This Woman
episodes.overview: Rebecca and Ken Pierce film themselves raising their four kids in idyllic rural Oklahoma. But the family is haunted by a specter of addiction and violence across generations that will leave two of them brutally murdered, and the family destroyed.

episodes.name: Who Am I?
episodes.overview: When Dianne Hart and Donnie Rudd begin an affair in a small Chicago suburb, Dianne's kids hope that their mum has found love. But instead it triggers a series of bizarre lies and deceptions that reveal a cold-hearted killer in their midst.

episodes.name: By God, That's Enough
episodes.overview: A single mom vanishes, and police uncover a terrible jealousy revealed through a shocking confession that leaves her family reeling.

episodes.name: Stay With Me
episodes.overview: Police uncover the shocking truth behind a dream couple.

episodes.name: Everyone's Favorite Uncle
episodes.overview: When wealthy bachelor Steve Clayton meets homely VA nurse Lana Walsh, it's love at first sight. But the devoted couple aren't immune to life's tragedies, and when an untimely death raises questions, an unsettling and devastating secret is revealed.

episodes.name: Second Chance
episodes.overview: A happily remarried woman fights for a new start, but life has other plans.

episodes.name: Out of His Shell
episodes.overview: Brett and Mona Wehde live a quiet life in sleepy rural Iowa raising their three children; when a new family arrives, relationships are made, but behind closed doors a wicked plot is hatched.

episodes.name: Plus-One
episodes.overview: In Michigan, a mother is murdered by her jealous ex-boyfriend. Friends and family examine home video footage and question if there were any warning signs.

episodes.name: It Was All of Them
episodes.overview: The Futos are a close-knit family of five who film their lives over many decades; four of them are found brutally murdered and the slayings uncover a terrible secret.

episodes.name: Hoop Dreams
episodes.overview: High achieving Keonte Chavis has always relied on her big, loving family to support her dreams. But when a sudden disappearance leads to a disturbing murder, they all face a dark and terrifying reality... the predator is one of their own.

episodes.name: Unmasked
episodes.overview: Rob and Lisa Whedbee are a beautiful couple who turn heads wherever they go; then a medical trauma upends their happy family, setting them on a path of destruction that will end in lies, accusations and a brutal home invasion.

episodes.name: Life in Florida
episodes.overview: In 1997, 78-year-old Jean Schwarzkopf was murdered in Florida. The retiree's husband owned a jewellery business, was she murdered for her diamonds?

episodes.name: Nothing Can Stop Us
episodes.overview: An odd couple with a "devilish" wedding date discovers love is not eternal.

episodes.name: Ghost From the Past
episodes.overview: In 2017, an unimaginable betrayal leads to the death of a woman in the state of Louisiana. Police discover she has been murdered by her estranged husband.

episodes.name: Unlucky in Love
episodes.overview: A woman's hopeful dreams of true love disintegrate into a deadly nightmare.

episodes.name: He Was Her Everything
episodes.overview: In Hudson, Wisconsin, Charlene, and Darrell Wold seem to be living a blissful existence with their blended family. They do all they can to keep their household safe and secure, but they never imagined the real danger would come from within.

episodes.name: With Honors
episodes.overview: Book smart Avis Banks always puts her career ahead of her love life, until she meets handsome teacher Keyon Pittman. But just when she's on the brink of having it all, a dirty secret tears them apart in the most brutal way possible.

episodes.name: By Design
episodes.overview: Growing up outside Chicago, the Simonian sisters are thick as thieves, even after they leave the nest to start new lives of their own. Then, when the youngest sets off to pursue her master's degree, a horrific crime tears the whole family apart.

episodes.name: What the Heart Wants
episodes.overview: Raised in a big Mormon family, Ashlee Harmon grows up wanting that same kind of lifestyle; she marries her college boyfriend, Emmett Corrigan, and raises five kids while he opens his own law firm, but dirty secrets soon trigger a deadly showdown.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Envy turns to hate when a killer snuffs out the life of a gifted performer.

episodes.name: Once a Killer
episodes.overview: A woman's blissful marriage to a younger man takes a detour into darkness

episodes.name: Say Your Prayers
episodes.overview: A faltering relationship had devastaing consequences for an entire family.

episodes.name: It Could Be Me
episodes.overview: A charismatic woman's turbulent romance slides a deadly downward spiral.

episodes.name: About to Break
episodes.overview: A divorced woman's second gamble at love may mean her luck has run out.

episodes.name: Tell Me You Love Me
episodes.overview: Ashley Pittman thinks she hit the lottery marrying Jeffrey Scott, and he gives her a cushier life than the one she left behind in small-town Louisiana; however, behind closed doors, a secret soon turns deadly.

episodes.name: Life On The Lake
episodes.overview: Gil Dossett and his family live an idyllic existence until an accident changes everything.

episodes.name: Dance With Me
episodes.overview: Ramon Sosa is a father of three who runs a successful boxing gym in Texas. He feels like the luckiest man alive until someone marks him for murder.

episodes.name: An Uncomfortable Day
episodes.overview: A woman meets her love match, but his idea of love may be her undoing.

episodes.name: It Was All Of Them
episodes.overview: A couple's dream of a blended family ends abruptly in a hail of bullets.

episodes.name: Broken Heart in Broken Arrow
episodes.overview: A woman with everything to live for can't foresee the darkness that awaits.

episodes.name: Safe At Home
episodes.overview: Doris falls for a friend, never thinking he'd soon become her greatest foe.

episodes.name: Put Yourself Out There
episodes.overview: A man vows to protect his new wife, but he's the one who needs protection.

episodes.name: When's Mom Coming Home
episodes.overview: Joann sees her man as a new beginning, but he may bring on her tragic end.

episodes.name: The Man Who Got Away
episodes.overview: A routine trip to a shopping center costs one devoted mom her life.

episodes.name: Rescue Me
episodes.overview: A monster in Ohio drowns out their victim's desperate pleas for help.

episodes.name: I Had No Choice
episodes.overview: Greed and manipulation transform an unlikely suspect into an axe murderer.

episodes.name: It's Over. Move On.
episodes.overview: A Pakistani family's big American dreams transforms into a bloody nightmare.

episodes.name: Brothers and Sisters
episodes.overview: A dietician's dashing new husband hides a horrifying Christmas surprise.

episodes.name: Only She Knows
episodes.overview: Young love gone horribly wrong leads to a gruesome discovery in a closet.

episodes.name: The Only Way Out
episodes.overview: No one sees the evil taking root inside a Florida home until it is too late.

episodes.name: Building is full of Snakes!
episodes.overview: A rock star of the snake breeding world falls prey to a venomous plot.

episodes.name: Two Anniversaries
episodes.overview: Family comes first to grandparents Ron and Kay Wilkson; though they may not have much money, their growing brood always know how to make their own fun; something evil is prowling close to home and not everyone makes it out alive.

episodes.name: You Got Me Mean
episodes.overview: Tammy Gardner loves being a mom and running a day care out of her suburban Delaware home; she also loves a night out on the town; what starts as innocent fun leads this 40-year-old down a dark path of jealousy and deadly rage.

episodes.name: Gone Hunting
episodes.overview: Police officer Albert Pacheco and his wife Cathy live on Hawaii's Big Island, raising four kids in the bosom of their close-knit church community; what looks like a household steeped in traditional goodness is hiding something evil.

episodes.name: Friends Outside of Work
episodes.overview: In the middle of 2017 deer season in Campbellsburg, Kentucky, the hunter becomes the hunted.

episodes.name: Day Three After Murder
episodes.overview: Divorced dad-of-three, Daniel Halseth, lives for visitations with his kids; when his teenage daughter Sierra claims that she wants to live with her dad, Daniel finds himself drawn into a web of lies and a plot that ends with a deadly house fire.

episodes.name: The Hidden Room
episodes.overview: The collapse of a business triggers a brutal murder in a secret basement.

episodes.name: Lake Placid
episodes.overview: Control trumps love in a marriage that ends inside a watery grave.

episodes.name: Enjoy the Moment While It Lasts
episodes.overview: A gruesome axe murder leaves a digital trail that unveils a heinous plot.

episodes.name: I Took Her Somewhere
episodes.overview: Tawnee Baird and Victoria Mendoza fell in love when they were teens. But when passion turns to rage, only one young woman will make it out alive.

episodes.name: He Wasn't Supposed To Be Here
episodes.overview: After three divorces between them, Roberta and Ken Samard seem to have finally found a marriage that can go the distance. Fifteen years on, they appear to be living their dream life in Oregon -- until an early morning call to 911 exposes the ugly truth.

episodes.name: Keep It Hush
episodes.overview: A home invasion in California leaves a family shattered and detectives scrambling for answers. As investigators hunt down the perps over several years, they join the dots to outline an evil plot born from greed and a need for total control.

episodes.name: Spoiled to Death
episodes.overview: David Sumney Sr. and his wife, Margaret, devote their lives to spoiling their only son, David; however, everything comes at a price, and when his parents divorce, David Jr.'s anger escalates, resulting in the deadliest of sins.

episodes.name: Screaming Bloody Murder
episodes.overview: Michelle Rogers and Matt Terry are together and share a son, Matt, but he has a dark side that comes out when he drinks; his rage explodes, leaving Michelle fighting for her life; Matt serves prison time, but tragedy strikes again when he gets out.

episodes.name: Breathe for Me Mom
episodes.overview: There's nothing Brian and Cheri Hartman won't do for their only child, Scott, including helping to raise his kids after a divorce; Cheri and Brian dote on their grandbabies, and the close-knit family thrives until a betrayal changes everything.

episodes.name: A Wedding and Four Funerals
episodes.overview: Cousins Joey Vincent and Terry Wedding grow up together in rural Kentucky; as Joey thrives, Terry struggles to find his own path; a 911 call reports a shocking event unfolding outside Joey's home that tears the two families apart.

episodes.name: The Punisher
episodes.overview: Brittany Steier devotes her life to being a mom and having a happy family; when the father of her children, Edward June Harris Jr, becomes increasingly violent and unpredictable, Brittany has to make a decision that will end up costing her life.

episodes.name: If Only He Had a Heart
episodes.overview: Tina Swor and partner John Dalton start a new life in Spirit Lake, Idaho; John's erratic behavior and love of guns plague the couple's fresh start; when Tina's best friend doesn't see her for days, she decides to call the cops.

episodes.name: Success at Any Cost
episodes.overview: Shirley Merritt is devoted to her family, especially her youngest son, Richard, but he wants to have the good life by any means possible; when bad choices lead to a prison sentence, Richard makes a deadly decision, and his secret is exposed.

episodes.name: We're Looking at You Barbara
episodes.overview: Barbara Pacheco spends years building both a family and a successful career; when the father of her children, Aldo Pacheco, becomes increasingly violent and unpredictable, Barbara is forced to make a decision that will end up costing everything.

episodes.name: Why You Recording Me?
episodes.overview: India Mackey live streams her life for all to see, but behind her smile on camera, her relationship with her boyfriend Kevin Dixon is painful; a day after her 20th birthday, India learns what her boyfriend Kevin can do.

episodes.name: Angels and Demons
episodes.overview: When Alessia Mesquita reconnects with her childhood crush, Rashod Newton, the couple fall desperately in love. When the romance becomes overshadowed by Rashod's behavior, Alessia has to make a decision that will have deadly consequences.

episodes.name: I Saw Dad Kill Mom
episodes.overview: The lives of a beautiful young family in Long Beach, New York, rip apart when five-year-old Audrey witnesses her mother, Diane, brutally stabbed to death. To Audrey's horror, her mother's murderer is somebody very close to home.

episodes.name: We Were Fooled
episodes.overview: Mark Eric and Sherri Ponsati have a picture perfect life, and the arrival of two children completes their family; when Mark Eric reports that Sherri has had a tragic accident, their world falls apart.

episodes.name: I Love My Wife
episodes.overview: Ann Metz lives for her family, particularly her two beautiful granddaughters; her husband Marshall despises Ann's giving her time to anyone but him, and he will go to desperate measures to keep hold of her.

episodes.name: Broken People
episodes.overview: When Jeff Silvernail returns home to find his partner, Lori, dead in a pool of blood, it appears to be a burglary gone horribly wrong.

episodes.name: The Biker & His Bride
episodes.overview: After two marriages and three children, Laurie Bursey thinks she found happiness in Kurt Bird.

episodes.name: Love Is Deaf
episodes.overview: As their relationship becomes rocky, Christie begins to fear Marcus's violent tendencies.

episodes.name: Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Christy Blankenship is stolen from her family when police find her dead at home with a gunshot wound to her head.
